attributes.long-description:
Receive both Assassin's Creed® Liberation HD and Assassin's Creed® Freedom Cry when you pruchase this bundle exclusively for digital download on Playstation® 3 computer entertainment system.

Assassin's Creed® Liberation HD:
Set in 1765, the seeds of the American Revolution are being sewn in Boston and New York as Spanish forces in the South plot to seize control of Louisiana for the Templars. As they secretly take hold of the slave trade in New Orleans, Aveline de Grandpré, an assassin of French and African heritage, stands ready to defend.

Asassin's Creed® Freedom Cry:
Rise up against slavery with Assassin’s Creed® Freedom Cry. Born a slave, Adewale found freedom as a pirate. Now, he has become a trained Assassin and an illustrious member of the Brotherhood. Forced to face his past after a ship wreck leaves him stranded in Port-au-Prince Haiti, he sets out to free slaves and bring death to their captors.

1 Player

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).  Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.sonyenteretainmentnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.

attributes.name: Assassin's Creed® Liberation HD and Freedom Cry Bundle
